sen.j: 八条宮穏仁親王（はちじょうのみや やすひとしんのう、寛永20年4月29日 (旧暦)（1643年6月15日） - 寛文5年10月3日 (旧暦)（1665年11月9日））は、江戸時代前期の日本の皇族。
sen.e: Imperial Prince Hachijonomiya Yasuhito (June 15, 1643 - November 9, 1665) was Imperial family who lived in the early Edo period.
Imperial Prince Hachijonomiya Yasuhito (June 15, 1643 - November 9, 1665) was a member of the Imperial family in the early Edo period.

sen.e: Imperial Prince Hachijonomiya Yasuhito (June 15, 1643 - November 9, 1665) was a member of the Imperial family in the early Edo period.

sen.j: 母は逢春門院藤原隆子（櫛笥隆致の女）。
sen.e: His mother was Hoshunmonin FUJIWARA no Takako (a daughter of Takachika KUSHIGE).
His mother was Hoshunmonin FUJIWARA no Takako (a daughter of Takachika KUSHIGE).
His mother was Hoshunmonin FUJIWARA no Takako (a daughter of Takachika KUSHIGE).

sen.j: 幼称は幸宮、若宮、又は阿古麿（あこまろ）。
sen.e: His childhood name was Yukimiya (幸宮), Wakamiya, or Akomaro.
sen.cmt: 幸宮→Yukimiya [正しい読み方が不明です]
sen.e: His childhood name was Yuki no miya (or Sachi no miya), Wakamiya, or Akomaro.
sen.cmt: 「幸宮」の読みは不明ですが、幼称の読みは他のファイル同様「○○のみや」で統一し、「ゆきのみや」もしくは「さちのみや」と思われます。漢字表記は削除し、英文には両方の読みを追記しました。
sen.e: His childhood name was Yuki no miya (or Sachi no miya), Wakamiya, or Akomaro.

sen.j: 承応3年（1654年）八条宮智忠親王には継嗣となる王子がいなかったため、親王の養子縁組となり若宮、又は阿古麿と称する。
sen.e: Because Imperial Prince Hachijonomiya Toshitada didn't have a son and hair, in 1654, he was adopted by the Imperial Prince and refered to himself as Wakamiya or Akomaro.
Because Imperial Prince Hachijonomiya Toshitada didn't have an heir son, in 1654, Yasuhito was adopted by Toshitada and called Wakamiya or Akomaro.
sen.cmt: hair -> heirrefered to himself as -> called
sen.e: Because Imperial Prince Hachijonomiya Toshitada didn't have an heir son, in 1654, Yasuhito was adopted by Toshitada and called Wakamiya or Akomaro.

sen.j: この背景には兄にあたる後光明天皇が急逝したために、万が一の皇統断絶の事態に備えて皇位継承の候補者を確保する目的もあった。
sen.e: Because of the sudden death of his older brother Emperor Gokomyo, it had been necessary for Imperial Prince Hachijonomiya Toshitada to ensure a possible heir to the Imperial Throne to prepare for a mere possibility for extinction of imperial line.

Because of the sudden death of his older brother Emperor Gokomyo, it was necessary for the Imperial court to secure nominees for the heir to the Imperial throne in order to prevent the extinction of imperial line.
sen.cmt: 皇位継承者を確保するのは朝廷と解釈して、英文を変更しました。
sen.e: Because of the sudden death of his older brother Emperor Gokomyo, it was necessary for the Imperial court to secure nominees for the heir to the Imperial throne in order to prevent the extinction of imperial line.

sen.j: 明暦元年（1655年）親王宣下を受け、元服する。
sen.e: He received the title of Imperial Prince in 1655 and had a coming-of-age ceremony.
He received the title of Imperial Prince in 1655 and had a coming of age ceremony.
sen.cmt: coming-of-age ceremonyの表記を他ファイルに合わせました。
sen.e: He received the title of Imperial Prince in 1655 and had a coming of age ceremony.

sen.j: 二品に叙せられ、式部省に任ぜられる。
sen.e: He received the title of Nihon (the second court rank for Imperial Princes) and worked for Shikibusho (Ministry of Ceremonial).
He was granted Nihon (the second court rank for Imperial Princes) and appointed to Shikibusho (Ministry of Ceremonial).
sen.cmt: received the title of Nihon-> was granted Nihonworked for -> appointed to
sen.e: He was granted Nihon (the second court rank for Imperial Princes) and appointed to Shikibusho (Ministry of Ceremonial).

sen.j: 寛文2年（1662年）7月養父智忠親王の薨去を受けて、宮家を継承する。
sen.e: In July 1662, his foster father Imperial Prince Toshitada passed away and he inherited Miyake (house of the imperial prince).
In August 1662, his foster father Imperial Prince Toshitada passed away and he succeeded to the Miyake (house of the imperial prince).
sen.cmt: 寛文2年（1662年）7月は新暦で8月です。
sen.e: In August 1662, his foster father Imperial Prince Toshitada passed away and he succeeded to the Miyake (house of the imperial prince).
